featuredTutorials.description: Install and run a sample Nomad environment. Schedule the sample job, deploy multiple instances of it, and perform a rolling update.
featuredTutorials.title: Get Started

featuredTutorials.description: Take a quick survey of the Nomad web user interface and learn how to perform common operations with it.
featuredTutorials.title: Explore the Nomad Web UI

featuredTutorials.description: Learn by doing! Use Nomad on real infrastructure in your web browser.
featuredTutorials.title: Interactive Labs

featuredTutorials.description: Add an Enterprise license to Vault, Consul, or Nomad with environment variables, a license file, or a configuration value.
featuredTutorials.title: Install a HashiCorp Enterprise License

featuredTutorials.description: Use the Nomad Autoscaler to dynamically resize your Nomad cluster to ensure your Nomad workloads meet your SLAs.
featuredTutorials.title: Horizontal Cluster Autoscaling

featuredTutorials.description: Deploy applications to multiple federated Nomad clusters with configurable rollout and rollback strategies.
featuredTutorials.title: Multi-Region Deployments
